Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.34624194]Virus:SARS-CoV-2:inhibition of infection in Vero cells(IC50=6.56 ± 2.14 μM);SARS-CoV-2 variants B.1.1.7:inhibition of infection in Vero cells(IC50=33.40 ± 10.75 μM);SARS-CoV-2 variants B.1.351:inhibition of infection in Vero cells(IC50=11.13 ± 3.82 μM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: The peptide acts as an inhibitor of the RBD–ACE2 interaction

Literature.Title: Computational Design of Potent D-Peptide Inhibitors of SARS-CoV-2.
Literature.Author: Valiente PA, Wen H, Nim S, Lee J, Kim HJ, Kim J, Perez-Riba A, Paudel YP, Hwang I, Kim KD, Kim S, Kim PM.
